sentences.en: Can't we just use the design patterns in redesign?
sentences.cn: 难道我们不可以只使用设计模式来重新设计 吗 ?

sentences.en: From something he let fall, I believe they are planning to redesign the machine.
sentences.cn: 从他透露的话里看, 我想他们是打算重新设计这台机器.

sentences.en: Grille passed radiator to redesign, taller than before steeper.
sentences.cn: 散热器格栅经过了重新设计, 比原来更高更陡.

sentences.en: Helping a transportation infrastructure company redesign its strategy and organization. Advise this company on operation process.
sentences.cn: 为一家交通基础设施提供商制定新的战略及提供业务咨询.
你将如何重新设计日历 呢 ?

sentences.en: II - Bike Friday did a major redesign of their folding suitcase'bent for 2006.
sentences.cn: 二 - 自行车周五做了重大的重新设计自己的折叠行李箱'徇私枉法,2006年.

sentences.en: Redesign, of course, is something they theoretically do all the time.
sentences.cn: 当然, 理论上说,重设这件事他们一直在做.

sentences.en: Simultaneously the flying contour line underwent the redesign hale and hearty newly many.
sentences.cn: 同时新飞度外形线条经过重新设计硬朗了不少.

sentences.en: The aims of the redesign are wide-ranging but simple.
sentences.cn: 重新设计的目的是多方面的，但又是简单的。

sentences.en: The air admission grill, lower part undergoes the redesign, increased the strength full auxiliary air inlet.
sentences.cn: 进气格栅, 下部经过重新设计, 增加了力道十足的辅助进气口.

sentences.en: The G 20 meeting in London did not redesign the architecture of the financial system.
sentences.cn: 伦敦的G20会议并未重新设计金融系统体系.

sentences.en: The giant bag used to capture the oil may also need a redesign.
sentences.cn: 用来收集油料的大袋子可能也需要重新设计.

sentences.en: The graphics are being touched up and the user - interface will receive a redesign.
sentences.cn: 图形正在被润色和,用户界面也将得到重新设计.

sentences.en: The hotel has recently been redesigned and redecorated.
sentences.cn: 该酒店最近刚进行了重新设计及装修。

sentences.en: We need to redesign the firefighters'clothing.
sentences.cn: 我们需要重新设计消防服.

sentences.en: We need to redesign the school system so that it produces a well-educated population.
sentences.cn: 我们需要重新设计教育体系，使之培育出拥有良好教育的一代人。

sentences.en: Yahoo has reduced the complexity of the cellphone graphical user interface ( GUI ) with its Go redesign.
sentences.cn: 无论屏幕有多大,该服务给我留下深刻印象的不是画面的清晰度,而是界面的清晰度.

trans.tran_en: If a building, vehicle, or system is redesigned, it is rebuilt according to a new design in order to improve it
